attributes.action: Limit MPs summer break from 7 weeks to 2 weeks until Brexit is resolved
attributes.additional_details: This is neither pro Brexit nor pro Remain. It’s just pro taking a decision.
attributes.background: With a deadline of 31 October 2019 set by the EU to resolve Brexit, there is not time for MPs to have their usual long break and they should be limited to a typical 2 weeks like most the public.
